document_data.name: Archiloque
document_data.mainbody: '''Archiloque''' was a [[gnome]] warrior and [[wizard]] inhabiting the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Archiloque was small even for a gnome.
document_data.Activities:
Though he practiced [[magic]], arthritis in his hands prevented him from casting all but the most basic [[spell]]s.

He lived in a house in the south section of Daggerford located on [[Kaoth Alley]] near the barracks.{{Cite interactive atlas|3990 Daggerford}}
document_data.Relationships: Archiloque was close friends with the skilled weaponsmith [[Ransaran]]. Ransaran crafted a special set of [[short sword]]s for Archiloque that included a series of straps and safety catches, allowing him to effectively wield the weapons with his arthritic hands.
